description.ruby-sapphire:
Confuses the foe, but
raises its SP. ATK.
description.emerald:
Confuses the foe, but
raises its SP. ATK.
description.firered-leafgreen:

confuse the foe,
but its SP. ATK
also rises.

effect.full: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.
